::KitKat::

She chuckled. "Yes, a teacher with a nack for sneaking around. Now 
please. Tell me why you are here.  I believe it would be the 
honorable thing to simply tell the truth.  Tell me, and I shall let 
you go. No harm.  I swear this to you. I have seen enough Mech fluid 
shed to last 20 life times."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> The small foxbot looked back and fourth between Drillbit and 
> KitKat, "I don't suppose you'd believe that I just happened to be 
in

> didn't know what to say. he couldn't use the truth 
>

to 
> veratis with the stolen DNA from various maximals and decided to 
stop 
> by and see what I could steel frim you. He'd only say that if he 
> wanted to commit suicide.
> 
> He decided to try to change the subject again. "Do any of us truly 
> know why we're here?" Isn't that the mysterie of the universe?" he 
> sat forward looking at his two hosts eye to eye "If I had the 
answer 
> to that I wouldn't have to be on this planet. I'd be teaching the
